trans-unit.source: Identifies a type as an object suitable for binding to an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 識別為適用於繫結至物件的型別<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: Use the DataObjectAttribute attribute to identify an object as suitable for use by an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用 DataObjectAttribute 屬性來識別該物件為適合使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>

trans-unit.source: Design-time classes such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner> class use the DataObjectAttribute attribute to present suitable objects to bind to an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> object.
trans-unit.target: 設計階段之類的類別<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner>類別用來呈現適當繫結至物件的 DataObjectAttribute 屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner>

trans-unit.source: For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需屬性用法的詳細資訊，請參閱[屬性](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute.IsDataObject%2A> property is set to `true` when you use the DataObjectAttribute constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute.IsDataObject%2A>屬性設定為`true`當您使用 DataObjectAttribute 建構函式。</xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute.IsDataObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute"></xref> class and indicates whether an object is suitable for binding to an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute"></xref>類別，並指出物件是否適用於繫結至<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Use the DataObjectAttribute constructor to indicate to a design-time class such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner> class that an object should be excluded from the list of suitable objects for binding to an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用 DataObjectAttribute 建構函式，例如表示設計階段類別<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner>類別的物件應該從適用於繫結至物件的清單中排除<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute.IsDataObject%2A> property is set to the value of the `isDataObject` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute.IsDataObject%2A>屬性設定的值為`isDataObject`參數。</xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute.IsDataObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the object is suitable for binding to an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> object; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果物件是適用於繫結至<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref>物件; 否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the class is suitable for binding to an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> object at design time.
trans-unit.target: 指出類別是適用於繫結至<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref>在設計階段物件。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: The DataObject field returns a new <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute> object with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute.IsDataObject%2A> property set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 傳回新的資料欄位<xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute>物件<xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute.IsDataObject%2A>屬性設定為`true`。</xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute.IsDataObject%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Represents the default value of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute"></xref> class, which indicates that the class is suitable for binding to an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> object at design time.
trans-unit.target: 代表預設值<xref href="System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute"></xref>類別，這表示此類別是適用於繫結至<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref>在設計階段物件。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: The Default field defines an instance of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute> class initialized with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute.%23ctor%2A> constructor, which sets the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute.IsDataObject%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 預設的欄位定義的執行個體<xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute>類別初始化與<xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute.%23ctor%2A>建構函式，設定<xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute.IsDataObject%2A>屬性`true`。</xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute.IsDataObject%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether this instance of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute"></xref> fits the pattern of another object.
trans-unit.target: 決定是否此執行個體<xref href="System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute"></xref>符合另一個物件的模式。

trans-unit.source: This method determines whether this instance of <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute> fits the pattern of another object.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會決定是否此執行個體<xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute>符合另一個物件的模式。</xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute>

trans-unit.source: An object to compare with this instance of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 與這個執行個體相比較的物件<xref href="System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: if this instance is the same as the instance specified by the obj parameter; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 如果這個執行個體所指定的執行個體相同 obj 參數，否則 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: 傳回這個執行個體的雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer hash code.
trans-unit.target: 32 位元帶正負號的整數雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether an object should be considered suitable for binding to an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> object at design time.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否應視為物件適用於繫結至<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref>在設計階段物件。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the object should be considered suitable for binding to an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> object; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果物件應該會被視為適用於繫結至<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref>物件; 否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the current value of the attribute is the default value for the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出屬性的目前值屬性的預設值。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current value of the attribute is the default; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果屬性的目前值是預設值。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the class is not suitable for binding to an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> object at design time.
trans-unit.target: 表示類別不是適用於繫結至<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref>在設計階段物件。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: The NonDataObject field returns a new <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute> object with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute.IsDataObject%2A> property set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 傳回新的 NonDataObject 欄位<xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute>物件<xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute.IsDataObject%2A>屬性設定為`false`。</xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute.IsDataObject%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。
